titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an extension of time for payment of estate tax for estates with closely held businesses, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/22/2000--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the permissible number of partners or shareholders in a closely held business for purposes of eligibility for an extension of estate tax payments.
